data.title: Best Non Profits Companies To Work For In Austin, TX
meta_keywords: best Non Profits companies to work for in Austin
companies Non Profits ranking in Austin
data.meta_description: The best non profits companies to work for in Austin, TX are Michael & Susan Dell Foundation, The Austin Stone Community Church, Caritas of Austin and more. Find out what it is like to work at non profits companies big and small across Austin and find the right place to work for.
data.text:
Company Description:

Southern Careers Institute has been a Texas institution for over 50 years. In that time we have trained students the professional skills necessary to gain employment in their local communities. In today's job market, you need skills and knowledge that will get you started, and put you in a position to advance. We are different than other schools. We care about each student's individual success and getting them started after graduation with employment opportunities that will help them grow and advance in life. Our instructors and career services staff are focused on preparing our students for a career after graduation. Our student's goal is our goal, their dreams are our dreams. We focus on success and their success is what we strive for. The combination of great training and job readiness skills is what helps them toward that success. At Southern Careers Institute, each student is different. Each student is an individual with goals and needs of their own. We do our best to understand those goals from the time a person first steps foot on our campus. We are dedicated to developing each students potential. We help achieve this by providing hands-on training and education through our career-focused programs. Are you someone who would like to move forward? Are you someone who wishes they could do more than what you are currently doing? Then let SCI show you the way toward reaching your goals and your potential. We invite you to take a look at our SCI family. For your convenience SCI Texas offers day and evening classes at all campus locations. San Antonio North, San Antonio South, Corpus Christi, Brownsville, Harlingen, and Pharr are branch campuses of Southern Careers Institute, Austin, Texas. Programs may vary by campus. Programs Offered: (varies by campus) * Administrative Assistant * Business Accounting Specialist * Medical Assistant * Medical Billing and Coding Specialist * Pharmacy Technician Need more reasons to choose Southern Careers Institute? * Career Placement Assistance * Instructors who care * Financial aid available, if qualified * Our programs are approved for VA Funding Southern Careers Institute is accredited by the Commission of the Council on Occupational Education. Council on Occupational Education 7840 Roswell Road, Building 300, Suite 325 Atlanta, GA 30350 (770) 396-3898 or (800) 917-2081 Southern Careers Institute is approved by the Texas Workforce Commission and the Texas Department of Assistive and Rehabilitative Services.
